___postgres_location.description: The name of the DC/OS postgresql instance to connect to.

___external_access.description:
Enable access from outside the cluster through Marathon-LB.
NOTE: this connection is unencrypted.

___virtual_host.description: For external access, Virtual Host URL to be used in the external load balancer.

___external_port.description: For external access, port number to be used for clear communication in the external Marathon-LB load balancer

___enable.description: Enable or disable creating a VIP for external access through a public node running Marathon-LB. Defaults to false.

___postgres_host_port.description: The port where the postgresql instance is listening on. Defaults to 5432

___mem.description: Memory to allocate to each postgresql node.

___cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each postgresql node.
